name: Scarlet Letter Bow Tie
description: Here's the much-anticipated newest release to our chalkboard collection. Sport this OoOtie to your next book club to prove to all the ladies you're not just street smart. Bonus points if you can ruin the ending for people who ask you what book it's from (we're not telling)! 100% Silk. Standard 2.5 inch bow with adjustable neck sizing from size 14 to 20. Very limited edition.

name: White Whale Bow Tie
description: Literary jokes aside, everyone has a white whale they're trying to get off their back. Except you, after buying this OoOtie and showing everyone you did what Captain Ahab couldn't. WHERE TO WEAR: Gloucester, your next harbor cruise, the aquarium. KEEP AWAY FROM: Plankton, fishing nets, shallow waters. 100% Silk. Standard 2.5 inch bow with adjustable neck sizing from size 14 to 20. Very limited edition.

name: Make Way for Ducklings V2 Bow Tie
description: Max never got the fuss while watching Saturday morning cartoons growing up - he always preferred duck season to wabbit season. In honor of everyone's favorite speech-impeded cartoon hunter, your friends at OoOtie are updating an old classic. Rock this knot around the back bay or your next trip to the frog pond. And to answer the question we know you're asking: of course it quacks. 100% Silk. Standard 2.5 inch bow with adjustable neck sizing from size 14 to 20. Very limited edition.

name: Paisley Butterfly Bow Tie
description: The dark colors on this sophisticated calico tie are dramatic, sexy and seem a bit old world. Perfect a vineyard tour in Southern France – your Bordeaux will blend right in if you happen to spill after a few too many sips. Not going across the pond this season? Wear this bow-tie to a tour of Napa Valley, to your cousin’s wine themed wedding in Sonoma, or just to your neighborhood wine bar for their Saturday afternoon tasting. DO: Pair this bow-tie with a dark colored suit and a jewel toned shirt. You might not think it but a pastel green, blue or gray will work well too. Dark jeans and a fitted button down tucked in can work for a more casual occasion if worn with leather dress shoes. DON'T: Wear this bow-tie with light colored suits, absolutely no light gray, white or linen allowed. Where to wear: Romantic dinner out at a dark, candle lit Italian restaurant, a wine tour in Tuscany, benefit dinner in the barrel room at a Northern California winery. Who:Channel Mr. Paquette, Clooney, Javier Bardem and Coppola. 100% Silk. Paisley in various colors. Standard 2.5 inch bow with adjustable neck sizing as needed. Very limited edition.

categories.name: Made By Brooks Brothers for OoOTie

categories.name: Made By Brooks Brothers for OoOTie

name: Make Way For Ducklings Butterfly Bow Tie
description: According to Bird Law in this country, we were only allowed to produce 25 of this limited edition tie, all silk ties. That means, like the ducklings, it is going to be gone before too long. Order your MAKE WAY FOR DUCKLINGS: A Bostonian Bow Tie today. These striking ducklings stand out in gold on green colors. Fashioned in all silk, this bow tie is made in the popular, elegant, and distinctive pointed configuration. Wear this tie to a Celtics game at the Garden, or next year's St. Patrick's Day Parade in Southie. But don't stop there...this tie will get attention and admiration from adoring fans of the iconic Boston sculpture as you walk through the Public Gardens and famous Boston Commons. 100% Silk. Standard 2.5 inch bow with adjustable neck sizing as needed. Very limited edition.

categories.name: Made By Brooks Brothers for OoOTie

categories.name: Made By Brooks Brothers for OoOTie

name: Fixie Bike Butterfly Bow Tie
description: The only thing that could make us happier than a bicycle bow tie, is a bird bow tie. Which reminds us, we need to make some of those for our happy customers in Portlandia who wont stop asking us to put a bird on it. DO: Switch gears and tie this knot up for work to help you get through the final stages of a week long crit at the office. DON'T derail your outfit by getting too many patterns or colors in the way. A safe bet is to pair this light blue tie with a white shirt. Where to wear: The Velodrome, a time trial, the TD Mayor’s Cup, and your neighborhood bike shop. Who: The 6-day warriors, Mile-A-Minute Murphy, Lance, and Bradley Wiggens. 100% Silk. Standard 2.5 inch bow with adjustable neck sizing from size 14 to 20. Very limited edition.

categories.name: Made By Brooks Brothers for OoOTie

name: Pink Polka Dot Bow Tie
description: Have your eye on a coed and want to get a bit cheeky by creating an intellectual, Professor vibe? There’s nothing like the wise teacher, innocent student fantasy to get the grades. Tie this on with a tweed blazer and corduroys. We provide the daringly cool style – you secure the role with a pipe, Manhattan and the fireplace. Where to Wear: The Harvard quad, that new Speakeasy themed bar, out to dinner in Cambridge or the Lower East Side. Who: Channel Roosevelt, Woody Allen and Andre 3000. DO: Deck yourself out as the empowered Ivy leaguer with tenure, pair this with dark dress jeans, a striped button down and brown leather Ferragamos, or get playful at the office with a navy or grey suit. DON'T: Think this bow tie only has one look. Although the Prof look might be just the thing for one tryst, this tie can be classed up or cooled down to fit in anywhere from 5th Avenue to Williamsburg. 100% Silk. Navy blue with pink stitched polka dots. Standard 2.5 inch bow with adjustable neck sizing as needed.

name: Pink and Blue Gatsby Bow Tie
description: Gatsby DO: Be interesting – Live vicariously through yourself. Ditch the poetry book and collection of chick flicks. The dash of pink is all the sensitivity you’ll need. Pair with dark colors, an inquiring gaze and a friendly smile. Wear this to a beach wedding, on a sailboat, or when hanging out with the Gatsby. DON’T: Be dull. This thought-provoking bow tie must be backed with personality to match. Be careful to avoid too much pink while you’re wearing this bow tie. Don't get to matchy with a Navy blazer or anything with gold buttons. Save that look for the captain - he can sail the boat while you fend off the ladies. Don't ever be caught frowning in this tie. When life gives you lemons, just make champagne. Why leave all the mystery to Jay Gatsby? Ditch the unexpected and embrace the interesting. Get ready to rock the best of both worlds with this bow. This bow-tie is tall, dark and handsome with a touch of sensitivity. Who are you really...? Why even tell? Channel: Patrick Dempsey, Ryan Reynolds, Robert Redford, The Most Interesting Man in the World 100% Silk. Standard 2.5 inch bow with adjustable neck sizing from size 14 to 20. Very limited edition.

name: Do the Polka Bow-Tie
description: Have your eye on a coed and want to get a bit cheeky by creating an intellectual, Professor vibe? There’s nothing like the wise teacher, innocent student fantasy to get the grades. Tie this on with a tweed blazer and corduroys. We provide the daringly cool style – you secure the role with a pipe, Manhattan and the fireplace. Where to Wear: The Harvard quad, that new Speakeasy themed bar, out to dinner in Cambridge or the Lower East Side. Who: Channel Roosevelt, Woody Allen and Andre 3000. DO: Deck yourself out as the empowered Ivy leaguer with tenure, pair this with dark dress jeans, a striped button down and brown leather Ferragamos, or get playful at the office with a navy or grey suit. DON'T: Think this bow tie only has one look. Although the Prof look might be just the thing for one tryst, this tie can be classed up or cooled down to fit in anywhere from 5th Avenue to Williamsburg. 100% Silk. Navy blue with white stitched polka dots. Standard 2.5 inch bow with adjustable neck sizing as needed.

name: Fixie Bike Bow Tie
description:
Fixie Bike Bow Tie
The only thing that could make us happier than a bicycle bow tie, is a bird bow tie. Which reminds us, we need to make some of those for our happy customers in Portlandia who wont stop asking us to put a bird on it.
DO: Switch gears and tie this knot up for work to help you get through the final stages of a week long crit at the office.
DON'T derail your outfit by getting too many patterns or colors in the way. A safe bet is to pair this light blue tie with a white shirt. Where to wear: The Velodrome, a time trial, the TD Mayor’s Cup, and your neighborhood bike shop. Who: The 6-day warriors, Mile-A-Minute Murphy, Lance, and Bradley Wiggens. 100% Silk. Standard 2.5 inch bow with adjustable neck sizing from size 14 to 20. Very limited edition.

name: Checkered Blue, Black, and White Bow Tie
description: At OoOTie we like to partner with special designers whenever we can. This bow tie was designed by someone making their men's fashion debut by the name of Apollo. Dress to impress in this classic checkered bow tie. For the debonair gentleman with exquisite taste, this accessory is surely to be on your wish list. It's time you add a new piece to your collection and become Recommended blazer-shirt combos: black jacket-white polka dot shirt, navy blue jacket-charcoal grey shirt. check out theapollofashions.com 100% Silk. Standard 2.5 inch bow with adjustable neck sizing from size 14 to 20. Very limited edition

name: Penguin Bow Tie
description:
It's a Penguin Party. This is the ideal candidate to break the ice! 

100% Silk. Standard 2.5 inch bow with adjustable neck sizing from size 14 to 20. Very limited edition.

name: Dinosaur V4.5 Bow Tie
description: Remember when you couldn't figure out if you like Dinosaurs or Robots better? So do we. As part of our ever expanding collection of amazing bow ties you won't find anywhere else we've brought the dinos back....again. This all silk, limited edition creation came from the OoOtie mastermind design team and wont last long. Take this Velociraptor bow tie to the Paleontology Annual Ball, or to any Jurassic themed party including all Jurssasic5 concerts. We made this one of a kind bow tie for Daniel and Grace's wedding! We wish them the best of luck and thank them for letting us share their wedding day bow tie with the rest of you! 100% Silk. Standard 2.5 inch bow with adjustable neck sizing from size 14 to 20. Very limited edition.

name: Dinosaur V4.0 Bow Tie
description: Remember when you couldn't figure out if you like Dinosaurs or Robots better? So do we. As part of our ever expanding collection of amazing bow ties you won't find anywhere else we've brought the dinos back....again. This all silk, limited edition creation came from the OoOtie mastermind design team and wont last long. Take this Velociraptor bow tie to the Paleontology Annual Ball, or to any Jurassic themed party including all Jurssasic5 concerts. 100% Silk. Standard 2.5 inch bow with adjustable neck sizing from size 14 to 20. Very limited edition.

name: Chalkboard Math Proofs V1 Bow Tie
description: It's that time of year again. Soon lots of sleep deprived math and computer science PhD candidates will be defending their years long research in something, literally no one else in the world knows as well as they do. So we decided to take some of their hard work and put it on a bow tie. 100% Silk. Standard 2.5 inch bow with adjustable neck sizing from size 14 to 20. Very limited edition

name: Periodic Table Bow Tie
description: Hold on a minute... Ok we're back! We needed to make sure we got the chemistry juuuuust right on this bow tie. Remember learning how many H's you needed for every O? Forget H-2-O, you're going to make it rain in this OoOTie! DO: Dress up to chemistry class and instead of all eyes on the professor, you're going to command attention from all your classmates. Thought you needed a cheat sheet to Ace that exam? Nope - just this bow tie. We chose the colors for a reason. Chalk boards we're once green and some of us remember the days of white chalk. This is more than just a classic - it's a time piece! (We wrote this description on our iPad's *sorry*) Channel: Matticus Pearlsticks, Bill Nye THE Science Guy, Poindexter, Diego Tri-Phosphate Where to Wear: The Miracle of Science on Mass Ave in Cambridge! 100% Silk. Standard 2.5 inch bow with adjustable neck sizing from size 14 to 20. Very limited edition.

name: Blue Periodic Table Bow Tie
description:
Hold on a minute... Ok we're back! We needed to make sure we got the chemistry juuuuust right on this bow tie. Remember learning how many H's you needed for every O? Forget H-2-O, you're going to make it rain in this OoOTie!

DO: Dress up to chemistry class and instead of all eyes on the professor, you're going to command attention from all your classmates. Thought you needed a cheat sheet to Ace that exam? Nope - just this bow tie.

Channel: Matticus Pearlsticks, Bill Nye THE Science Guy, Poindexter, Diego Tri-Phosphate

Where to Wear: The Miracle of Science on Mass Ave in Cambridge!

100% Silk. Standard 2.5 inch bow with adjustable neck sizing from size 14 to 20. Very limited edition.

name: Curiosity on Mars Red Planet Rover Bow Tie
description: Curiosity Rover This isn't the first time we've sent a rover to the Red Planet or made a bow tie with a robot on it. However, this robot is such a bad ass US aerospace engineers deployed it onto the martian surface with a SKY CRANE during a sequence known as Seven Minutes of Terror. What a cool freaking entrance! This is also the first time OoOtie engineers showed a little love to the aero/astro kids down the hall with a bow tie that speaks their language. While Curiosity is doing its thing on the fourth rock from the sun, we suggest you take take part in this moment of human ingenuity and snatch up one of these limited edition bow ties before the final count down. DO: Did you just a private message from that hottie from the jet propulsion laboratory? Tie this bow on and get ready for blast off. Other acceptable uses: your aero astro PhD quals, public astronomy night at the observatory, or local science cafe. Attending a party where they would ask if you knew the morse code sequence in its track than if Johnny5 was still alive. Alternatively enjoying the Seven Minutes of Terror.Engineer. DON’T: Don't mistake this red and gold number as dressy: curiosity is not a fancy bow tie. Don't wear this tie anywhere that came with a paper invitation that required to an RSVP. Unless the words, Science, Institute, or Astronautics are in the name of the place you are going its probably safe to leave this one at home. We chose the colors for a reason. Mars is red, and Curiosity cost 40x as much as gold on a per mass basis. Channel: Frank C. Mars, Adam Steltzner, Mariner 4, and that kid with the wicked Mohak at JPL. Where to Wear: The Miracle of Science on Mass Ave in Cambridge! 100% Silk. Standard 2.5 inch bow with adjustable neck sizing from size 14 to 20. Very limited edition.

name: Caffeine Starbucks inspired bow tie
description: We know what keeps you going during those late nights at the office and, we hope, those mornings after later nights out on the town. We may not have have figured out how to get you that fuel through osmosis (yet - Max is working on it), but make sure you grab this OoOtie so you're well equipped to go the distance morning, noon, or night. 100% Silk. Standard 2.5 inch bow with adjustable neck sizing from size 14 to 20. Very limited edition.

name: Caffeine Dunkin' Inspired Bow Tie
description: We know what keeps you going during those late nights at the office and, we hope, those mornings after later nights out on the town. We may not have have figured out how to get you that fuel through osmosis (yet - Max is working on it), but make sure you grab this OoOtie so you're well equipped to go the distance morning, noon, or night. 100% Silk. Standard 2.5 inch bow with adjustable neck sizing from size 14 to 20. Very limited edition.

name: Red and White honey badger don't give a... bow tie
description: Red and White honey badger don't give a... bow tie If you're a member of badger nation, or a fan of that crazy nastyass honey badger video - then you should seriously buy this limited edition red and white woven silk bow tie. DO: Pair it with a crisp white shirt under your cardinal and white striped overalls at a Camp Randall tail gate. Best part about a bow tie? You won't drag your tie through the brats or cheese spread. DON’T: Don't miss out. Channel: Barry Alvarez, Bucky the Badger, Gunter Blobel, and Randall. Where to Wear: Memorial Union and the Terrace, Camp Randall, the FUN. concert, and the Rose Bowl. 100% Silk. Standard 2.5 inch bow with adjustable neck sizing from size 14 to 20. Very limited edition.

name: Purple and Gold Great Moustache Bow Tie
description: Purple and Gold Great Moustache Bow Tie Yo! Movember is over, but you can still sport your mo' all year with this tribute to great moustache. Set in purple and gold, we choose some of the most distinctive mouth brows we could find to create this fabric. Each tie has a unique set of moustaches and each is one of a kind. DO: Consider this bow tie a perfectly acceptable way of showing your support for men's health issues especially if you can't grow a mo' yourself. Chances are your lady friend will be a little more into this version anyway. DON’T: worry about choosing your favorite 'stache, theres plenty of time to try them all. Channel: Ron Swanson, Hulk Hogan, Lionel Richie, Ron Burgandy, and Burt Reynolds. Where to Wear: the saloon, a shoot out at high noon, or a Movember related event. 100% Silk. Standard 2.5 inch bow with adjustable neck sizing from size 14 to 20. Very limited edition.

name: Blue Paisley Bow Tie
description: Looking sharp has never been this simple. Take your look to the next level and be the man of the house with this timeless essential. This bow tie truly looks regal! Another classic paisley brought to you by OoOTie. 100% Silk. Standard 2.5 inch bow with adjustable neck sizing as needed. Very limited edition.

name: White Paisley Bow Tie
description: Looking sharp has never been this simple. Take your look to the next level and be the man of the house with this timeless essential. This bow tie truly looks regal! Another classic paisley brought to you by OoOTie. 100% Silk. Standard 2.5 inch bow with adjustable neck sizing as needed. Very limited edition.

name: Chicago Market Bow Tie
description: Did you know that each star on the municipal flag of Chicago represents something? We'll let you go dig it up on the interwebs, but heres a little teaser: the first start represent "salubrity", a condition conducive to health and well being. Tell that to the people of the Great Fire of 1871! Introducing the Chicago Market bow tie. 100% Silk. Standard 2.5 inch bow with adjustable neck sizing from size 14 to 20. Very limited edition!

name: Jolly Roger Pirates Steel Gray Bow Tie
description: Grab a bottle of rum and this new OoOtie for your next trip on the seas. Whether you're the captain of the ship, or its first mate you don't need to worry about this bow tie getting in your way as you trim the sheets, or make someone walk the plank. 100% Silk. Standard 2.5 inch bow with adjustable neck sizing from size 14 to 20. Very limited edition

name: Jolly Roger Pirates High Risk Red Bow Tie
description: Grab a bottle of rum and this new OoOtie for your next trip on the seas. Whether you're the captain of the ship, or its first mate you don't need to worry about this bow tie getting in your way as you trim the sheets, or make someone walk the plank. 100% Silk. Standard 2.5 inch bow with adjustable neck sizing from size 14 to 20. Very limited edition

name: Purple Sunglasses Bow Tie
description:
Purple Sunglasses Bow Tie
Its summer time, and that means putting on a sweet pair of shades and dusting off the blender for frozen drinks on a rooftop. The gensis of this trendy summer bow tie design may or not have been conceived during a hot summer afternoon, when the OoOtie crew knocked off early, dusted off the blender, and had Max mix up some of his signature frozen cocktails. What we can confirm, is the hot fire these neon shades will bring to your wardrobe this summer. Tie this knot up this summer time and let the living get easy. 100% Silk. Standard 2.5 inch bow with adjustable neck sizing from size 14 to 20. Very limited edition.

name: Airplane Bow Tie
description:
The engineers at OoOtie think Luis C.K. was right when he called commercial air transportation the miracle of human flight on Connan's show last year (seriously, check out that bit if you haven't seen it.) So as a salute to the blue skies we put a daul engine single aisle aircraft, the workhorse of commercial aviation, onto a bow tie. DO: Wear this the next time you're going 100 mph on BOS Logan runway heading 30,000 feet into the air for transcontinental or transatlantic flight. Don't Wait too long to buy this tie. The Air and Space Museum in Washington DC bought almost all of these limited edition ties and only left about 10 in inventory!

100% Silk. Standard 2.5 inch bow with adjustable neck sizing from size 14 - 20. Very limited edition.

name: Boston Strong Bow Tie
description: Blazing Yellow and Reflex Blue are the colors of strength, pride, and courage. You'll see them running over the Esplanade in the middle of winter on negative degree days. You'll see them pulling on the Charles River on warm summer afternoons. You'll see them anywhere you look in Boston, and I bet dollars to donuts that you'll be seeing a lot more of them now. Join OoOtie co-founders Diego and Matthew in supporting One Fund Boston and their plans to run the 2014 Boston Marathon. Because 26.2% of each sale will be donated to the 2013 One Fund Boston, we kindly ask that you do not use any discount codes on the Boston Strong Bow Tie. Where to Wear: Fenway, The Garden, Boston Commons, BSO, a yellow bus to Hopkinton. 100% Silk. Standard 2.5 inch bow with adjustable neck sizing from size 14 to 20. Very limited edition.

name: Zombie Bow Tie
description: Bring out 'yer dead This isn't a tie Monty would like. Its a tie Monty would LOVE. Whether you are a Walking Dead fanatic or just a guy with a flair for the fantastic, the Prince of Pop agrees that Zombies are THRILLING and bring the ladies close, not that you need any help. Everybody knows the ladies dig a gent in a bow tie, dead or alive. So suit up and slide this super slick tie 'round your neck for a ghastly good time. DO: Wear this out strolling your graveyard, crypt, or wanting to shake up a black tie affair with a subtle nod to the undead. And make sure to don this black beauty at the Zombie Apocalypse for sure. DON'T: Slip this on at a funeral, with small children, or when going toe to toe with aliens... best to sneak up on them and take them by surprise. Black on Black 100% Silk. Standard 2.5 inch bow with adjustable neck sizing from size 14 to 20. Very limited edition.

name: Ninja-what?!?! Black Paisley Bow tie
description: This is our classic black-on-black paisley bow tie reconfigured in the elegant pointed bow tie with a special little surprise on the back. Although we normally say that our OoOties can be worn almost anywhere, our lawyers are making us put a special warning on this tie based on beta user testing. We can't release the full details, but it went something like this: [Scene: Max is playing with his dog, Mr. Spaghetti-O's in the OoOtie offices] Max: Did you hear that? Max: **cricket, cricket** {{KATANA SLICE!!! SUPER JUDO KICK TO THE FACE!!}} ** SILENCE ** Max: What the what?! ... my face! [End Scene] [Scene: Max is hanging at a local bar and approaches] Max: Did you know there was a Ninja on my neck tie? Classy Lady: No. No I didn't. Max: Of course you didn't! ITS A NINJA! Classy Lady: Holy crap. I can't stand here. This is ninja country! [End Scene] Bottom line...be careful wearing this tie out and about. You've been warned. What happens when you put a pirate, a zombie, and a robot from the future in a room together for an epic, fight to the death (again?) Battle Royale? Well we weren't sure either...but turns out the Ninja wins. 100% Silk. Standard 2.5 inch reversible bow with the diamond cut and adjustable neck sizing as needed. Very limited edition.

name: Owl Wool Bow Tie
description:
Owl Wool Bow Ties Get ready Portlandia because we just jumped the shark and put a bird on this super fresh wool bow tie. It's not just any bird either, its a Strigiforme, otherwise known as an owl to those without a degree in ornithology. Sorry hipsters, no swallows or ravens here, just bad-ass birds that rotate their heads 270 degrees, have serrated feathers to keep them stealthy like sky ninjas, and asymmetrical ear placement to help them catch the freshest beats (heart beats that is). One last fact, and this one is for Robert, a group of owls is known as a parliament or a wisdom. How cool is that? DO: If you're a on your way to visit your friends Harry or Hermione at Hogwarts, or checking out the Audubon event this fall you need to tie this up. This tie will also help improve your night vision, and according to local Charlestown legend, it acts as an aphrodisiac on full moons. DON'T: The color of an owl allows it to blend into the environment. It likes to be subtle. We used natural tones to mimic the colorations and the texture patterns of fall and winter seasons, so don't go too crazy with colors.
Where to wear: Audobon, Portland boutiques, and anytime you're eating a tootsie pop. Who: Hedwig, the Tootsie Pop Owl, and Owl from Winnie the Pooh. 100% Wool. Standard 2.5 inch bow with adjustable neck sizing from size 14 to 20. Very limited edition.

name: Pooches Prefer Bow Ties
description:
Pooches Prefer Bow Ties The Labrador retriever has been the most popular dog in the US, the UK, and Canada for over 22 years and it’s no surprise why. These beloved canines are gentle, intelligent, and family friendly. If you’re like most urbanites and can’t get your own best friend, this bowtie might just be enough to hold you over.
DO: They say puppies are chick magnets. While we believe its more about the man behind the bowtie, it probably wouldn’t hurt your chances of striking up a conversation with some coeds while wearing this tie during an autumn stroll through the quad or camping out at a coffee shop and working on some problem sets.
DON'T: While this tie doesn’t need to be fed, it thrives with active and sporty owners. Regular wearing keeps it temperament even and a faithful companion for years to come.

Where to wear: AKC, Westminster, or your local kennel club. For a stroll through your the park on a crisp Fall day
Who: President Bill Clinton’s beloved First Lab, Buddy. Britain's most “dog of the millennium”, Ednal. 100% Silk. Standard 2.5 inch bow with adjustable neck sizing from size 14 to 20. Very limited edition.

name: A Jumbo Elephant Bow Tie
description:
Lucky Elephants The Elephant stands for wisdom, strength, intelligence and power. Guess thats why P.T. Barnum donated Jumbo, the massive African Bush Elephant, to Tufts University in Boston as its mascot after it traveled all over the world with Barnum's circus.

Prior to the fire in 1979 that destroyed Jumbo's hide, superstitious Tuft's students would dip a coin into Jumbo's nostril for good luck on exams. Now you can rock this bow tie and not have to worry about elephant snot on your pocket change. DO's: Try your luck and add this stylish tie to your wardrobe. Wear as a conversation piece, on a date, or to the casino. Remember to spend some of your winnings at OoOtie.com. Make a wish – but choose carefully. This elephant-studded bow tie is sure to make even the wildest wish come true. DON'Ts: Be afraid to take a chance with fashion. Good style is always worth the gamble. CHANNEL: P.T. Barnum, and Jumbo the Elephant At OoOTie we believe in loving our animals. We assure you not a single elephant was harmed in the making of this bow tie and not a single elephant came up with this idea of making this bow. We rely on our elephants for wisdom and to eat our peanuts... that's about it.

100% Silk. Standard 2.5 inch bow with adjustable neck sizing from size 14 - 20. Very limited edition.

name: White Pigs on Red Bow Tie
description: Get your pigs on! Ready for Sunday Brunch? We are! It'll be hard to decide which way to tie this delicious OoOtie. You can show off your piggies or wear it bacon side out. One thing is for sure, this OoOtie will make your mouth water. DO: Be the topic of conversation while you wait for your eggs and biscuits to served. Pair this OoOtie with simple shirt - you don't want to frighten the animals. DON'T: Don't take yourself too seriously.You might want to stay away from PETA Rallies though. 100% Silk. Standard 2.5 inch reversible bow with adjustable neck sizing as needed. Very limited edition.

name: Presidential Series – Teddy Roosevelt Bow Tie
description: A classic bow-tie with a famous man on a horse. Is it Paul Revere on his midnight ride? General Washington standing six-foot-ten and weighing a full ton atop his mighty steed? No, its President Teddy Roosevelt being a bad-ass in the bad-lands of the Dakotas. Look at that horse! That horse is amazing! Oh yeah, and there's a buffalo on the back for good measure, just like those old timey nickles. Assuming office after President McKinley was assassinated, Teddy Roosevelt was known for many things: the Panama Canal, Trust busting, railroad regulation, and perhaps most famously for being the inspiration for the Teddy Bear. Roosevelt was born a wealthy city boy but his heart was out on the range. He spent years as a cowboy in the Dakotas and became tough as nails and fit as a bull moose. Once in Milwaukee he was shot in the chest, but decided to give a 90 minute speech first before being taken to the hospital. Now that is dapper and manly. Where to wear: The Oval Office, the political campaign trail, stump speeches, and any time you stand up against corruption. Who: President Theodore Roosevelt, 26th President of the United States of America. 100% Silk. Standard 2.5 inch bow with adjustable neck sizing from size 14 to 20. Very limited edition.

name: Mystery Bow Ties      (2 for $49)
description:
We want to liquidate our extra ties, you want couture style on the cheap...so we're doing a grab-bag-style bow tie clearance! These are pre-production, high quality seconds, and a few styles that we're trying to unload to make room for new stuff. $45 bucks gets these left-overs reheated and delivered to your door.

Made from 100% Mystery
All sales for grab bag ties are final

name: Rush Shipping!
description: Need it by noon tomorrow - we can make that happen for you!
